name: The Next Day After Friday
description: The Next Day After Friday is an after party unique hangover game. There is only one rule in the game and that is the rule of free will.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7,8,10 Processor: Intel core i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 970 4GB DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1800 MB available space Additional Notes: HTC VIVE
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7,8,10 Processor: Intel Core i7 6700K Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Gefroce GTX 980 4GB+ DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 1800 MB available space Additional Notes: HTC VIVE
